articles.content: It could hardly have been more contrary to the gung-ho principles that underpin Ben Stokes brave new world. Still, Zak Crawley dug in like never before to help give England a narrow advantage as wick… [+5805 chars]

articles.title: CITY AND BARCA SHARE SIX-GOAL THRILLER | FC Barcelona 3-3 Man City | HIGHLIGHTS - Man City
articles.description: City levelled in added time to secure a 3-3 draw with Barcelona in an entertaining friendly at the Camp Nou.Julian Alvarez opened the scoring for the Blues, ...
